subject: improve: enhance notification instructions with iOS Safari dual-layer permissions and better icon states
body:
- Add iOS Safari-specific instructions covering BOTH system-level and browser-level permissions
- Fix icon accuracy: now shows correct states for loading, granted, denied, and undetermined
- Add granted state handler: clicking bell when enabled shows confirmation instead of re-requesting
- Import getDeviceType for platform-aware Safari instructions

Addresses user feedback:
1. Mobile web (iOS Safari) requires checking TWO places for notifications
2. Icon now accurately represents all permission states
3. Instructions only show when permissions are denied (correct behavior)
title: enhance notification instructions with iOS Safari dual-layer permissions and better icon states
